thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 89 of 7354
thread.title: Frank

author: Frank
title: Frank
text: B&H makes the shopping experience a breeze. For starters the search option finds items specific to what you are searching for and doesn't cause wasted time by cluttering the results with non-related items. Check out couldn't be easier, especially when I use my PayPal account. A couple clicks and I am done. My one suggestion is for B&H to show more prices without requiring one to place items in the shopping cart. Other than that one minor glitch, it is always a pleasure to do business with a company that values it's customers.
